about_the_game:
When players enter the game, they will experience a unique and exciting journey through the game. First, they'll notice that the game uses a minimalist line style and high contrast, which makes the whole world appear clear and vivid. Players will not only feel the simple beauty of the game screen, but also find that every unit, every scene contains carefully designed details.
The gameplay of the game is also unique. The combination of turn-based and RTS makes combat more strategic, with operational trade-offs allowing players to focus on the most effective tactics. Special level design and BOSS battles bring more challenges and fun, the RES system gives the player a tactical advantage, and the tactical decryption design inspires the player to dig deeper into the game.
The story is equally compelling. Players will explore a wide variety of flat creatures in two-dimensional worlds, facing a sense of urgency and challenge against the backdrop of cosmic destruction. The hidden Stone of Dirac records the truth of everything, while eternal love runs through the game world, giving players a unique emotional experience.

-- Visual style and gameplay:
Simple line style and high contrast, bring a sense of novelty.
Innovative gameplay, combining turn-based and RTS, simplified but tactical.
Special defeat penalties that challenge the player's strategic thinking and tactical skills.
Inheritance mechanics, which may refer to the inheritance relationships of mechanics or elements within a game.
-- Level design and system:
Special level design and BOSS battles make the game more challenging and fun.
RES systems provide advantages, which may refer to resource management systems or related strategic advantages.
Tactical decryption design may mean that the player needs to decrypt or reveal certain tactical mechanics or information.
-- Story and world building:
The plot is rich, novel and full of science fiction elements.
The two-dimensional world of flat creatures, the background of the destruction of the universe, the motivation to explore and survive.
The hidden Stone of Dirac records the truth of the world, deepening the mystery and story of the game.
Highlight eternal love as an important theme in the game world.
-- Other features:
Multiple language options, international support.
Use classical music as a style and choice for game sound effects or background music.
